item.title: About
item.description: 0 or 1 is my culture, one of the Oeste Geek Day idealists - event about IT and geek/nerd culture lovers - IT infrastructure, management, development, data engineering, big data, artificial intelligence and analytics are all part of my daily life, geek, self-learning and cyber security enthusiast, writer in my spare time and a black screen lover. In short, just a guy fascinated by computers.
